intro: A story of familial love that unfolds under the midsummer sky— The timeless masterpiece, AIR, is now playable on the Nintendo Switch™!
description:
AIR is the work from the visual novel studio, Key, known for titles such as Kanon, CLANNAD, Little Busters!, Summer Pockets and more. It received great acclaim and was even adapted into an anime series.
This moving tale centered around themes of familial love and the characters' sensitive emotions is coming to the Nintendo Switch™, fully voiced by a magnificent cast.

Includes "First Sky Chapter"!
AIR's only side story novel, "First Sky Chapter", is included in fully voiced visual novel format with stunning visuals by Itaru Hinoue, the artist who worked on the original game.

Featuring retouched HD visuals and CG coloring!
This version not only offers the best HD visuals to date, but the game's CG coloring has also been adjusted to better suit the Nintendo Switch console's display colors. Enjoy the experience with even more beautiful graphics.

Playable in three languages!
The text can be set to English, Simplified Chinese, or Japanese (audio is in Japanese only). This includes in-game text, options, and the digital manual. Language settings can be changed at any time.

Play using only the touch screen! Play with one hand!
Play in handheld mode with the Nintendo Switch Joy-Con™ controllers attached, or detach them and play with just the touch controls. While in tabletop mode or TV mode, everything can be controlled using only the Joy-Con (R), allowing you to play with only one hand.
Also available for the Nintendo Switch Lite. (A separate Joy-Con (R) is required to play with one hand.)

Gameplay
Gameplay in this choice-based visual novel involves reading through the story while making choices at certain key points. Different decisions may lead to different outcomes, story branches and endings.

Story
Summer had come to that town.

A young man is performing with a puppet in front of a seaside bus stop. Only two children are watching his show. However, they soon lose interest and run off.

The young man is a wanderer. He has two companions on his travels. A decrepit old doll that moves without strings and a powerful oath made a long time ago.

Just when he began to feel despair, a young girl comes to talk to him. She has a friendly, innocent smile. Following this meeting with her, the young man begins to live in that town. Spending gentle days enveloped in the scenes of summer. Encounters with girls in the sunlight.

Summer stretches on endlessly.
Beneath the vast blue sky.
Beneath the air in which she awaits.

Staff
Original Picture: Itaru Hinoue
Scenario: Jun Maeda / Yuuichi Suzumoto / Takashi Ishikawa
Music: Shinji Orito with Key / Magome Togoshi

Cast
Now available fully voiced by a stellar cast of voice talent!
